## instance() function

Obtain metadata for the current GCE instance

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function instance<T = any>(options?: string | Options): Promise<T>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | string \| [Options](./gcp-metadata.options.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;T&gt;

## Example


```js
const gcpMetadata = require('gcp-metadata');

// fetch all instance metadata
const instanceMetadata = await gcpMetadata.instance();

// fetch properties with custom querystring parameters:
const data = await gcpMetadata.instance({
  property: 'tags',
  params: { alt: 'text' }
});

```
